pages.text: While in the player's inventory, the $(thing)Demon Will Aura Gauge$() will display a HUD element to show how much $(raw)Demon Will$() is in the local $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/aura)Aura$(). You can hold [$(k:sneak)] to get a numerical value for each $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/aspected_will)Will Aspect$().
